Example Output for Running Win32 WBEM Services Executables

Last Updated 09/26/03

The following is the output from starting the CIMOM by running start_cimom.bat in a command window and then stopping the CIMOM via control C (^C).

C:\>cd \files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\bin>

C:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\bin>start_cimom
*********************************************************
Starting up the CIMOM
*********************************************************
c:\jdk1.2.2\bin\java -classpath C:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\lib\wbemstartup.jar -Dpropdir=C:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\bin -Djava.security.manager -Djava.security.policy=C:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\bin\cimom.policy -Dlogdir=C:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\logr  org.wbemservices.wbem.bootstrap.StartWBEMServices  C:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\bin\WBEMServices_Win32.properties

^C
Terminate batch job (Y/N)? y
